roleset.name: to sing with trills, quavers, or melodic embellishments
roleset.note: WARBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warble' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry animal_sounds-38, manner_speaking-37.3.frame by Perryn (from warble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: cuckoo
example.text: Oh the cuckoo, she's a pretty bird, and she warbles as she flies.
